courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: Junior standing in Dance or consent of the instructor.
description: Methods and approaches to the teaching of dance technique in the modern, ballet, and jazz idioms. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: Junior standing in Dance or consent of the instructor.
label: Teaching Workshop
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
